duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently accomplish general or routine office administrative tasks with minimal guidance
Records and file management, employee in- and out-processing, and management of government timecard program
Assist in managing DOD, DCSA, and local office policies and programs
Support the field office chief in scheduling and office equipment and supply inventory maintenance
Correspondence drafting and routing, travel planning, conference room coordination, and receipt and routing of office mail/correspondence
Management of task management system and execution of office training program
